column4: hi, how can I make all pages of a pdf the same size? I scanned a document and this page is way too big when I view the pdf
and how can I save this state? I need to send it to someone and it should be all the same size at his computer too
no, this state can't be saved, this is user's preference; in the very best case you can set it in adobe pdf printer properties (properties button next to printer name in print dialog)
